title: Decay and no skin from mission.
body: I have all skins available, what were we meant to receive from the mission giving the epic skins? I got nothing. And I thought decay was meant to be turned off for preseason just got this notification.

replies.body:
Submit a support ticket explaining what happened and they can hook you up with a suitable alternative.

As for the decay notification, I believe you still decay in preseason, but it won't affect your end of season rank or rewards at all.

when was the last time you logged in?

I logged onto my account for the first time after 3 weeks and got the same message even though technically its preseason now. probably was just in the bank.

You probably just flat out get nothing then, which is kinda sucky.

As for Decay, who knows, but it shouldn't actually effect your rank for next season, so it's your call as to whether you fix it or not.
